name: damselfly
description: Damselfly is a self-hosted photo and video management app with AI-powered tagging and search features. It includes facial recognition, bulk processing, and a responsive UI for browsing media collections efficiently.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Automatic image recognition and labeling. Organize photos effortlessly

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find photos using AI-powered queries. Locate images instantly

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Beautiful interface that works on all devices. Browse anywhere, anytime

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your photos private on your server. Complete control over memories
